document_data.name: Abigail
document_data.mainbody:
'''Abigail''' was a follower of [[Gond]] who worked at the [[High House of Wonders]] in [[Baldur's Gate]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|The things I have learned during my apprenticeship are simply, well, wondrous!|Abigail, in her letter to Benji.}}
document_data.Personality: Abigail was absolutely enamored with the inventions dreamt up and created by her fellow [[Gondar]] devotees.
document_data.Relationships: Both of Abigail's parents were alive for much of her life. She had at least one sibling, a brother named [[Benji]] who was a member of the [[Emerald Enclave]].
document_data.History: At some point, Abigail wrote [[On the Subject of Gond and Progress|a letter]] to Benji imploring him to come visit her at the High House in Baldur's Gate.
